bibl.title: Painted Hellenes. Mummy Portraits from Late Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Media and provenance. - Recent scholarship. - Cultural influences and identification of the subject. - Circumstances of the production of mummy portraits. - Mummy portraiture in Late Antiquity. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Approaching Late Antiquity. The Transformation from Early to Late Empire

bibl.seg: WALKER Susan, Painted Hellenes. Mummy Portraits from Late Roman Egypt.
Simon SWAIN and Mark EDWARDS (Edd.), Approaching Late Antiquity. The Transformation from Early to Late Empire (Oxford, 2004) pp. 310-326, 3 figg. et 2 pll. coul.

Media and provenance. - Recent scholarship. - Cultural influences and identification of the subject. - Circumstances of the production of mummy portraits. - Mummy portraiture in Late Antiquity. - Conclusion.
